project.description: This project used to publish opengauss summary2021;

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" IMAGE_VERSION="v0.0.1" PROJECT_NAME="opengauss-summary-2021"
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker not installed." exit 1 fi
cd $WORKSPACE/packages/summary2021
echo "building opengauss summary" docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/summary/opengauss-summary:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/summary/opengauss-summary:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/summary/opengauss-summary:$IMAGE_VERSION
if [ -d "infra-openeuler" ]; then rm -rf "infra-openeuler" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-openeuler cd infra-openeuler/applications/opengauss-summary else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/summary/opengauss-summary:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use kustomize to replace old app image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "Update opengauss-summary2021-image:$IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
